title: Saar Biotech-Calcium Carbonate and Vitamin D3 Syrup|Pharmaceutical Manufacturing Company
meta: Saar Biotech is a third party manufacturing in which we manufacture Calcium Carbonate and Vitamin D3 Syrup is useful in people having low blood calcium levels; who do not get enough calcium from their diets. Calcium is necessary for many normal functions of body, especially bone formation and maintenance. Low blood levels of calcium may cause bone disease. Vitamin D increases the intestinal absorption of calcium. Thus this combination helps in maintance of calcium & healthy bones.
